name: Subconscious Tour
description:
Final project submission for UC Berkeley Art 173: Electro Crafting Fall 2020. Come with us and take a tour of our subconscious. Like your own subconscious, pay attention to the details to learn more about the thoughts, feelings, and ideas that drive our actions.

Controls: mouse (point-and-click)

Repo: https://github.com/AshZhang/art173-final/

Course website: https://socalledsidefx.com/finalshow

  • Code: Ashley Zhang
  • Art: Giancarlo DiLuce
  • Music: Elena

Thanks to:

  • Chris Kubick for a great semester!
  • All the influences that have driven this work.
